Heavy Rain Lashes Eastern India, South India Sees Monsoon Revival
Heavy Rain Lashes Eastern India, South India Sees Monsoon Revival
Edited By
WION Video Desk
Published:
Oct 02, 2025, 14:21 IST
| Updated:
Oct 02, 2025, 14:21 IST
The weather has played a dramatic role across several regions, from downpours in the east to cloudy skies in the north in India. Eastern India is bracing for a wet spell. Watch the video to know more on this!
